hero.title: Choose the Perfect Plan for Your Store
hero.subtitle: Unlock the power of AI-driven conversations. Start with a 7-day free trial.

status.testModeDesc: You won't be charged during development. Billing will be activated in production.
status.trialDays: ðŸŽ‰ {{days}} days remaining in your free trial

starter.title: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small stores getting started

professional.title: Professional
professional.description: For growing businesses that need more power

changePlans.question: Can I change plans later?
changePlans.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your dashboard. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any differences.

afterTrial.question: What happens after the 7-day trial?
afterTrial.answer: After your trial ends, you'll be charged monthly based on your selected plan. You can cancel anytime during or after the trial period with no penalties.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with our service, contact our support team for a full refundâ€”no questions asked.

conversationDefinition.question: What counts as a conversation?
conversationDefinition.answer: A conversation is a complete interaction session with a customer, regardless of the number of messages exchanged. Sessions timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity.

trust.title: Trusted by over 1,000+ Shopify stores worldwide
